vstore.framework.context

Class ContextManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • vstore.framework.context.ContextManager

  • public class ContextManager
extends java.lang.Object

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private static ContextManager instance 
      private static ContextDescription mCurrentContext
      This field contains the current context description.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
      private ContextManager() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ContextManager clearCurrentContext()
      This method clears the current usage context and resets it to an empty state.
      static ContextManager get() 
      ContextDescription getCurrentContext()
      This method returns the usage context currently used for matching.
      static void initialize()
      Initializes the context manager by reading the context data from the persistent file, if available.
      ContextManager persistContext(boolean makePersistent)
      Use this method to make the currently configured usage context persistent after a restart of the framework.
      ContextManager provideContext(ContextDescription context)
      Use this method to provide new context information to the framework.

    • Field Detail

      • mCurrentContext

        private static ContextDescription mCurrentContext
        This field contains the current context description.

      • instance

        private static ContextManager instance

    • Constructor Detail

      • ContextManager

        private ContextManager()

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        public static void initialize()
        Initializes the context manager by reading the context data from the persistent file, if available.

      • get

        public static ContextManager get()
        Returns:
        Gets the instance of the context manager.

      • provideContext

        public ContextManager provideContext(ContextDescription context)
        Use this method to provide new context information to the framework. If the new information should be persistent after a restart of the framework, persistContext(boolean) should be called.
        Parameters:
        context - The new context information
        Returns:
        Returns the context manager instance again to simplify method-chaining.

      • persistContext

        public ContextManager persistContext(boolean makePersistent)
        Use this method to make the currently configured usage context persistent after a restart of the framework.
        Parameters:
        makePersistent - True if the context should be persistent. False if you want to undo this.
        Returns:
        Returns the context manager instance again to simplify method-chaining.

      • clearCurrentContext

        public ContextManager clearCurrentContext()
        This method clears the current usage context and resets it to an empty state.
        Returns:
        Returns the context manager instance again to simplify method-chaining.

      • getCurrentContext

        public final ContextDescription getCurrentContext()
        This method returns the usage context currently used for matching. If you want to refresh it, use provideContext(ContextDescription)
        Returns:
        A ContextDescription-object containing the current usage context description
